long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A chrome extension to get real time crypto rates of Koinex.


Version 1.1.0:
set alerts to get notified when rates cross upper or lower thresholds.

Version 1.2.0:
changing number alerts to %, separate alerts for all crypto; better notifications

Version 1.3.0:
adds OMG and REQ and some UI changes.

Version 1.4.0:
code changes as per modified data format from koinex
